data.text: @heycandyjane @ArianaGrande @BigSean @MacMiller Relationships can definitely become toxic over time. All of a sudden you feel your trapped and you have no idea how to get yourself out of that situation, I completely agree. It’s just incredible how quickly things can break down in a relationship, no matter who you are.

@Nicks_era @ArianaGrande @BigSean @MacMiller You can only ask someone to get better so many times before you throw in the towel. I feel like she made that comment because of people kissing her and telling her she should’ve stayed. That truly is a toxic situation. I HATE that he lost his life though. Way too young.

@heycandyjane @ArianaGrande @BigSean @MacMiller you should encourage them and hope they work through their demons, but instead she just put more oil on the fire. Within a few months of their breakup; he crashed his car, got a dui, his ex got engaged, and he overdosed. While she isn’t the reason of his death, she didn’t help

@heycandyjane @ArianaGrande @BigSean @MacMiller Ok yes i agree, he had an addiction-but addiction can come for anyone tbh. I just felt it was wrong of her to blast him on Twitter because of some fans tweet, when all he ever did was praise her publicly. If someone has an addiction you shouldn’t shun that person——

@Nicks_era @ArianaGrande @BigSean @MacMiller Dude, that’s the way he died. He was an addict battling issues. She said she’s not his babysitter/mom because she told him if he didn’t get help that she would leave him. 
I agree that she shouldn’t have rushed into getting engaged so fast.

@heycandyjane @ArianaGrande @BigSean @MacMiller Also- why get engaged to someone so quickly, if they turn out to be an asshole just a few months in? Marriage is a big  step, why rush in?Secondly, we assume Mac was such an addict, because Ariana portrayed him that way. 🤷🏻‍♂️

@heycandyjane @ArianaGrande @BigSean @MacMiller This has been going on for years for her, it’s not new. If she simply breaks up that’s one thing, but it’s the pettiness. To blast someone on social media whose never said a bad thing about you, bc of a fan. To be engaged a week after you break up with someone you loved. Etc,cmon https://t.co/k3jJo1JMlz
@Nicks_era @ArianaGrande @BigSean @MacMiller Her and Mac broke up because of his drug addiction. Pete was an asshole it just took her a while to see it. She’s not playing victim at all IMO.
